about_the_game:
Animals have been infected by unknown substances, which makes them hyperactive and extremely irritable, but at the same time, due to excessive exercise, they will die in a short period of time. Temporarily avoid them or accelerate their death to survive!

Some characteristics

Only supports mouse and keyboard. your initial skill is "Coin Thrower", and coins will be thrown towards your cursor, which can be used to briefly stop the movement of monsters.

Monsters will automatically die every once in a while. After the monster dies, collect as many gems as possible to level up and deal with the next wave of monster attacks.

The process is streamlined. and each game is within 3 minutes.

The gameplay is relaxing, requiring no prior collection. With just a bit of thought and clever maneuvering, you can escape and survive.

Crazy monster

Mantis: Medium health, medium movement speed, medium attack power;

Snake monster: low health, high movement speed, high attack power;

Killer bee: high health, low movement speed, low attack power; Bee stings have low attack power, but their ballistic speed is extremely fast and they carry frame damage!!!

Insert a digression

Let me briefly introduce myself. I am 27 years old, known as Mimen in the wuxia world. I am currently working to support myself while learning Unreal Engine to make games. My ultimate goal is to create a pixelated wuxia ARPG game by myself. However, due to my limited energy, sometimes I don't even want to write after work, so I only wrote a script of about 26800 words in just over six months. With this progress, I am afraid that my wuxia game may not be completed in 20 years. After thinking about it, I have to come up with this bottom line and make this small game first to prepare for full-time development of independent games in the future. Therefore, I need your help.

If I am fortunate enough to resign, I will complete the writing of the game script within 2 years, organize the character network, write biographies of important characters, etc., so that I can directly view them when I reach a corresponding level of favorability with specific characters in the game. At the same time, I will complete the English translation of the game script; After completing the script, I will design the art of characters, scenes, props, skills, special effects, UI, etc. based on the plot, and simultaneously arrange and produce the game music. The arrangement will use an older instrument, which may take 4 years to complete; The final stage will integrate the code written in the previous years to ensure stable operation of the game, while optimizing game performance. If everything goes smoothly, the game should be launched within another year; The final game will mainly feature a long storyline, character development, and boss strategy. These are all my plans for the wuxia game. I apologize that I can only convey my message to English users in this way.

In short, whether you are interested in pixelated wuxia ARPG or want to try casual games without collecting elements, please kindly click on your wishlist and join us!

Wishing all players a pleasant gaming experience~
